Package com.skloch.game

Class GameUi

java.lang.Object
com.skloch.game.GameUi
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameUiInterface
public class GameUi extends Object implements GameUiInterface
A class to display the game's user interface, including the energy bar, time, stats, and dialogue box. This class is called by the GameScreen class to render the GUI.

      Parameters:
      game - The game object
      gameScreen - The game screen object
      gameLogic - The game logic object
      eventBus - The event bus for subscribing to game events
      gameScreenProvider - The game screen provider
